description:
Introducing a must-have piece from our original collection, this versatile vest offers both style and utility, whether paired with a hoodie or used for hunting.

Constructed with soft and quiet 65 % recycled polyester and 35 % cotton, this reversible vest ensures minimal noise disruption during your hunt. Equipped with multiple pockets, it provides ample storage space for essential items while keeping your hands warm. What sets this reversible vest apart is its unique 80g insulation made of GRS-certified 100 % recycled polyester, making it a standout in the market.

Whether you're in hunting mode, cabin mode, or seeking an impeccable look, our reversible vest guarantees visibility and attention, no matter which side you choose to wear it on!
name: Hooke Reversible Hunting Vest - Mens
